title: Stocks in focus: Nazara Tech, NMDC, Happiest Minds and more - Economic Times
content: Stocks in focus: Nazara Tech, NMDC, Happiest Minds and more  Economic Times
description: Nifty futures on the Singapore Exchange traded 225.5 points, or 1.35 per cent lower at 16,465.50, signaling that Dalal Street was headed for a negative start on Friday. Here are some stocks which may buzz the most in today's trade.
